TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit AddInStore extends System.Object
public ref class AddInStore abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides methods to store and find information about available add-ins and pipeline segments.

span.span: Provides methods to store and find information about available add-ins and pipeline segments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表中所述，使用這個類別來建置、 重建和更新兩個快取檔案。Use this class to build, rebuild, and update two cache files, as described in the following table. |快取檔案Cache file|建立檔案的方法Methods that create the file| |----------------|----------------------------------| |PipelineSegments.storePipelineSegments.store

這個檔案位於管線目錄結構的根目錄中。This file is located in the root directory of the pipeline directory structure.|

更新檔案與新的管線區段。Updates the file with new pipeline segments. 如果安裝沒有新的區段，則這個方法只會驗證快取。If no new segments are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重建該檔案，並且包含新的管線區段。Rebuilds the file and includes new pipeline segments.| |AddIns.storeAddIns.store

這個檔案位於此目錄包含一個或多個增益集子目錄中。This file is located in a directory that contains one or more add-in subdirectories. 如果此目錄是在管線目錄結構，其必須為增益集。If this directory is in the pipeline directory structure, it must be named AddIns.|

更新與新的增益集的指定位置的檔案。Updates the file with new add-ins at a specified location. 如果您的增益集管線目錄結構之外，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.

如果安裝沒有新的增益集，則這個方法只會驗證快取。If no new add-ins are installed, this method just validates the cache.



重建該檔案，並且包含增益集的指定位置。Rebuilds the file and includes add-ins at a specified location. 如果您的增益集管線目錄結構之外，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method if your add-ins are outside the pipeline directory structure.



如果增益集管線目錄結構中，這個方法會以新的增益集更新檔案。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method updates the file with new add-ins.



如果增益集管線目錄結構中，這個方法會重建該檔案，並包含新的增益集。If the add-ins are in the pipeline directory structure, this method rebuilds the file and includes new add-ins.| 如果先前存在，這些方法會建立快取檔案。These methods create the cache files if they do not previously exist. 建立快取檔案之後，請使用方法來檢查檔案，以找出所有的增益集符合指定的主機檢視增益集。After the cache files are created, use the method to examine the files to find all add-ins that match a specified host view of the add-in. 您也可以使用方法來尋找特定的增益集。You can also use the method to find a specific add-in. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它不支援以允許未受信任的使用者或實體存取 PipelineSegments.store 和 Addins.store。It is unsupported to allow untrusted users or entities to access PipelineSegments.store and Addins.store. 如此一來，可能會導致資料損毀問題的應用程式。Doing so can cause data corruption issues for applications. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何更新快取檔案。The following example shows how to update cache files. [!code-csharp[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/cs/P3Host.cs#2)] [!code-vb[AddInP3Host#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/addinP3Host/vb/p3host.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找到單一增益集管線，則是唯一的項目中集合。If a single pipeline for an add-in is found, it will be the only item in the collection. 如果找不到指定的增益集的多個管線，您就可以區分它們藉由檢查屬性。If multiple pipelines to the specified add-in are found, you can differentiate them by examining the property. ## Examples 下列範例會尋找特定的增益集。The following example finds a specific add-in.
